settings.headline: Do You Dream In Hubbard?
settings.body: The Dreams Collection combines the durability and softness of 100% merino wool with the playfulness of bright all-natural dyes.

settings.headline: OEKO-TEX® Certified
settings.body: These eco-friendly shoes are OEKO-TEX® certified to be free of harmful chemicals and safe for human use.

settings.headline: 100% Merino Wool
settings.body: Made with all-natural, 100% Merino wool felt, using only plant-based dyes, and never treated with harmful chemicals like bleach.

settings.headline: Handcrafted Women's Shoes
settings.body: Samuel Hubbard shoes are designed in Mill Valley, California and handcrafted by shoe artisans in Portugal.

settings.title: Clog
settings.description: With contrasting colored linings Hubbard Dreams Clogs will brighten up your at-home look as well as out-of-home style.

settings.title: Adjustable Clog
settings.description: Live the dream with colorful style and adjustable straps that make for the perfect fit.

settings.title: Spring Back
settings.description: Light, fun, thoughtfully designed, Hubbard Dreams Spring Back shoes are the perfect combination of style and comfort.

settings.headline: 30 Day Happiness Guarantee
settings.body: Give your new Hubbards a 30-day walk test. If you are not delighted by their comfort, we’ll refund your purchase.

settings.headline: Trade-Up
settings.body: $50 off a new pair of Hubbards when you donate your old shoes –any brand– to someone in need.
